# Official Website for ERC Team of Prof. Dr. Bernd Skiera {style="text-align:center"}

## Goethe University Frankfurt, Germany {style="text-align:center"}

::: {style="text-align:left"}
The [European Research Council](https://erc.europa.eu/homepage) (ERC) provided [Prof.Dr.Bernd Skiera](contact.qmd) at [Goethe University Frankfurt in Germany](https://www.goethe-university-frankfurt.de/en) with a substantial (ERC Advanced Investigator) research grant to examine the economic consequences of stronger restrictions on tracking technologies. Professor Skiera and his team pursue [several empirical projects](publications.qmd) to demonstrate these consequences.
:::
